user of RAD 6.0.1 came across this problem when using CVS:
An internal error occurred during: "Fetching children of Versions".              
java.lang.NullPointerException                                                   
at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.repo.RepositoryRoot.                        
getDefinedModules(Unknown Source)                                                
at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.repo.RepositoryManager.                     
getFoldersForTag(Unknown Source)                                                 
at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.model.VersionCategory.                      
getProjectVersionChildren(Unknown Source)                                        
at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.model.VersionCategory.fetchChildren         
(Unknown Source)                                                                 
at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.model.VersionCategory.                      
fetchDeferredChildren(Unknown Source)                                            
at org.eclipse.ui.progress.DeferredTreeContentManager$1.run(Unknown              
Source)                                                                          
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Unknown Source)                     

-----------------------

Came across the forum entries at:
http://dev.eclipse.org/newslists/news.eclipse.platform/msg33599.html

--------------

In order to bypass the problem, is there a way to correct the "improperly
formatted CVSROOT/modules file"?

This was fixed in 3.1

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 72586 ***
